warpStar.name: Warp Star
warpStar.description: The well-rounded beginner machine with balanced stats and stable handling. Reliable in almost all situations.

wingedStar.name: Winged Star
wingedStar.description: A gliding-focused machine with exceptional lift and air control, but weaker ground grip and acceleration.

shadowStar.name: Shadow Star
shadowStar.description: A dark machine with extreme offense and drifting skill. Fragile but deadly when played aggressively.

wagonStar.name: Wagon Star
wagonStar.description: A heavy tank-like machine with no charge ability. Extremely high HP and offense but terrible turning.

slickStar.name: Slick Star
slickStar.description: A slippery drifting machine that sacrifices grip for high turning potential and style-focused control.

formulaStar.name: Formula Star
formulaStar.description: A pure speed machine with massive top-speed scaling but very weak acceleration and off-road ability.

bulkStar.name: Bulk Star
bulkStar.description: A powerhouse that charges by braking. Massive HP and destructive offense, but sluggish handling.

rocketStar.name: Rocket Star
rocketStar.description: A machine that must charge before blasting forward. Incredible boost power but weak turning and grip.

swerveStar.name: Swerve Star
swerveStar.description: A unique machine that cannot turn except when drifting. Monstrous offense and burst speed.

turboStar.name: Turbo Star
turboStar.description: A highly responsive machine with strong acceleration and solid overall speed.

jetStar.name: Jet Star
jetStar.description: A machine specializing in air boosts and gliding. Weak on ground but powerful when airborne.

wheelieBike.name: Wheelie Bike
wheelieBike.description: A fast and responsive motorcycle with high cornering speed but lower stability.

rexWheelie.name: Rex Wheelie
rexWheelie.description: A heavier, more powerful variant of the Wheelie Bike with improved offense and HP.

wheelieScooter.name: Wheelie Scooter
wheelieScooter.description: An extremely lightweight machine with unmatched turning but very low offense and HP.

hopStar.name: Hop Star
hopStar.description: A bouncy machine that hops continuously, gaining height and unique dodge potential.

vampireStar.name: Vampire Star
vampireStar.description: A sinister machine that drains HP from others on contact. Low durability but high offense.

paperStar.name: Paper Star
paperStar.description: An extremely light machine that flutters in the air. Terrible HP but surprisingly good turning.

chariot.name: Chariot
chariot.description: A fast and aggressive machine with strong offense and durable armor.

battleChariot.name: Battle Chariot
battleChariot.description: A reinforced version of the Chariot with stronger armor, higher offense, and reduced agility.

tankStar.name: Tank Star
tankStar.description: A defensive powerhouse with high HP and grip. Slow but nearly unstoppable.

transformStar.name: Transform Star
transformStar.description: A machine capable of changing forms mid-race. Balanced stats with high potential when mastered.

bullTank.name: Bull Tank
bullTank.description: A heavier, more violent version of the Tank Star with extreme offense and weight.

dragoon.name: Dragoon
dragoon.description: A legendary machine with unmatched gliding, top-tier speed, and massive aerial control. Difficult to acquire but overwhelmingly powerful.

hydra.name: Hydra
hydra.description: A brutal legendary machine built for raw destructive power. Extremely heavy, explosive acceleration, and catastrophic offense.
